timeline.message:
all: Add grpc-xds

This will fix reporting of xDS code coverage.

timeline.bodyText: Is this collection used for both javadoc and jacoco?
timeline.author: dapengzhang0
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -18,6 +18,7 @@ def subprojects = [
     project(':grpc-protobuf-lite'),
     project(':grpc-stub'),
     project(':grpc-testing'),
+    project(':grpc-xds'),

replies.bodyText: Yes. It also adds a dependency in the grpc-all pom.
replies.author: ejona86
